column4: Hello, I'm an idiot... but eth0, which I set as my wireless card cannot be found
is there a wireless LED on your laptop to tell its detected
does dmesg say anything about your card ; what type of card do you have ?
dmesg doesn't say anything about my wireless
what version of ubuntu are you using
the laptop you are trying to configure, does it have net access ?
now extract it with, tar jxvf bcm*
then cd bcm* folder, ./configure ; make   (then do) sudo make install
i gotta go, how are you getting on ?
